rules_text:
Whenever Baril, Static Selector becomes the target of a spell or ability, create a Treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{4}{R}{G}: Baril, Static Selector deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Target creature you control gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
